review: First of all, I ordered this when it was offered for $19.99 to Prime Customers I believe back in October with a guaranteed delivery date of before Dec 23rd.  When I checked out, the delivery date changed to Jan 2015.  Best Buy then had them on special at the first of Dec for $24.99 so I Bought 2.  Amazon's Fire TV Stick arrived around Dec 18th finally, well after Best Buy and everyone else had them available and for only $5 more than that "SPECIAL PREORDER PRICE FOR PRIME MEMBERS ONLY."I am extremely disappointed that it does not have the two most important Channel Apps that I use, HBOGO and SHOWTIME ANYTIME and several others.  I was going to give all 3 as gifts but am selling them on eBay instead because all three ppl that would have been the receivers of them, must have HBOGO and SHOWTIMEANYTIME.  And also the Time Warner Cable channel app as they all live in NYC.So, I and they are sticking with the ROKU 3 streamer, still the best on the market in my and many other friends and families opinions.Very disappointed in Jeff Bezos for releasing this half baked item.  Also, same with the Fire Cell Phone, which I will rate later in the appropriate space.....a disappointment.
